sentences.en: " Am I good enough to put on airs?'said Miss Tang.
sentences.cn: 唐小姐道: “ 我们配有架子 么 ?

sentences.en: " The Classics on Tea " , written by Lu Yu of the Tang Dynasty ( 618 A . D . - 907 A . D . ) was the world's earliest treatise on tea leave production.
sentences.cn: 中国唐代陆羽写的《茶经》是世界上最早的茶叶制作专著.

sentences.en: Hearing of Uncle Zhang's heart attack, Doctor Tang was extremely worried and rushed to his bedside immediately.
sentences.cn: 听说张大爷心脏病犯了, 唐大夫心急如火立即赶去抢救.

sentences.en: Li Bai was a Tang poet of superb talent.
sentences.cn: 李白是唐代一位才气横溢的诗人.

sentences.en: Miss Tang said, " Mr. Fang, you are too concerned with insignificant details.
sentences.cn: 唐小姐道: “ 方先生真会挑眼!

sentences.en: She could smell the salty tang of the sea.
sentences.cn: 她能闻到海水浓烈的咸味。

sentences.en: She is very fond of Chinese classical literature and has spent some time reading Tang and Song poetry, etc.
sentences.cn: 她很喜欢中国古典文学,诸如唐诗 、 宋词等都涉猎过.

sentences.en: The child could reel off many poems of the Tang Dynasty at the age of five.
sentences.cn: 这孩子五岁时就能把许多唐诗倒背如流.

sentences.en: The Giant Stone Buddha at Leshan Mountain in Sichuan Province of China, carved in the Tang Dynasty ( 618 A . D . - 907 A . D. ) , is 71 metres high , making it the largest statue of Buddha in the world.
sentences.cn: 中国四川的乐山大佛是世界上最大的佛像雕刻.它高达71米, 修建于唐代.

sentences.en: The Tang Dynasty made Chang'an its capital.
The Tang Dynasty produced a host of great poets, such as Li Bai, Du Fu and Bai Juyi.
sentences.cn: 唐朝有很多大诗人, 像李白 、 杜甫、白居易等.

sentences.en: There was a tang of excitement in the air.
sentences.cn: 空气中有着一种兴奋的浓烈气息.

sentences.en: Tieh can move in with the Tang family. It's quite safe there,'suggested Ke - ming .
sentences.cn: 爹可以到唐家去, 那儿很安全, ” 克明 提议说.

words.tran_cn: 扑鼻的；有刺激性的；强烈的
发出铿锵声；发出当的一声

trans.tran_cn: 强烈的味道或气味，柄脚，特性
